hero.name: Bulşah Keçici
hero.title: Data Scientist & Computer Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems and data-driven solutions

about.title: About Me
about.bio:
Hi, I'm Bulşah. I live in Ankara and I've been building AI systems for over 9 years. What I love most is taking messy data and turning it into something that actually works in the real world.

When I start a new project, I first try to really understand the problem. Where does the data come from? What's missing? What are we actually trying to solve? Once I get that clear, I build the solution step by step.

I work a lot with machine learning and computer vision. But I don't just build models—I make sure they work reliably, can be measured, and keep improving over time. I handle everything from data pipelines to deployment and monitoring. My background in statistics helps me think clearly, and my engineering side helps me turn ideas into real products.

Python and SQL are my daily tools, along with Docker, Kubernetes, and Git. For me, tech is just a tool—the real goal is solving problems that matter.

I also love traveling and meeting people from different cultures. There's something special about seeing how different places approach the same problems. It reminds me that the best solutions come from understanding the people behind the data.

I'm open to working in Germany and across Europe. I enjoy international teams and learning from different perspectives on technology and innovation.

highlights.title: Career Highlights
items: For 9+ years, I've led data science work end-to-end—from problem framing to production deployment and monitoring.
I deliver measurable AI and automation systems that directly improve real decision-making workflows.
I build high-performing models validated with the right metrics and proven reliable in real-world use.
In computer vision, I combine detection, tracking, and classification with real-time pipelines and automation.
I build data pipelines with Python and SQL, and make deployment and operations sustainable with Docker, Kubernetes, and Git.
I turn data science outputs into usable web/desktop products through full-stack implementation.
I designed multi-layer healthcare management systems covering role-based access, scheduling, treatment planning, finance, and reporting.

about.availability: Open to relocation and collaboration in Germany and across Europe

items.name: Vehicle Speed Detection System
items.desc: An advanced AI-powered traffic monitoring system that uses YOLOv8 for real-time vehicle detection, license plate recognition (LPR), and automated speed violation tracking. The system calculates dynamic fines based on vehicle insurance values and integrates with PostgreSQL for comprehensive reporting and analytics.
items.result: Achieved 95% detection accuracy with real-time processing capabilities. Successfully integrated automated database reporting, enabling traffic authorities to monitor violations efficiently and generate detailed analytics reports.

items.name: Multi-Platform Dental Management System
items.desc: A comprehensive healthcare management platform designed for dental clinics, supporting web (Angular), mobile (Flutter), and desktop (WPF) applications. Features include role-based access control, treatment planning, appointment scheduling, financial management, automated discount calculations, and comprehensive reporting modules.
items.result: Successfully deployed in real clinical environments. The modular architecture allows seamless scalability across platforms, with unified patient data management and cross-platform synchronization. Reduced administrative workload by 60% through automation.

items.name: OpenTicket Event Management System
items.desc: A complete digital ticketing platform built with ASP.NET Web Forms, featuring comprehensive event management, QR code generation and validation, real-time ticket scanning, admin dashboard with CRUD operations, and automated event reporting. Designed for seamless event organization and attendee management.
items.result: Implemented end-to-end event management solution with QR-based ticket validation. Reduced ticket fraud by 100% and streamlined event operations. The system supports multiple event types with customizable ticket categories and pricing.

items.name: Web Survey & Analytics Platform
items.desc: A responsive web-based survey system with advanced data collection capabilities, real-time analytics dashboard, customizable survey forms, multi-question types support, and comprehensive reporting features. Built for research institutions and organizations requiring efficient data gathering and analysis.
items.result: Created scalable survey platform with real-time data visualization and analytics. Supports complex survey logic, conditional questions, and export functionality. Successfully handles high-volume responses with optimized database queries and caching mechanisms.

items.title: Building Production-Ready AI Traffic Monitoring with YOLOv8 and Computer Vision
items.excerpt: In this comprehensive technical deep-dive, I explore how to build a real-time vehicle speed detection system using YOLOv8, OpenCV, and PostgreSQL. Learn about the challenges of license plate recognition in varying lighting conditions, implementing dynamic fine calculation algorithms, and achieving 95% detection accuracy in production environments. The article covers model optimization, database schema design for high-frequency writes, and building reliable monitoring pipelines that scale.

items.title: Architecting Multi-Platform Healthcare Systems: Lessons from Production
items.excerpt: Building healthcare management systems that work seamlessly across web, mobile, and desktop platforms requires careful architectural planning. This article shares insights from developing a production-grade dental clinic management system using C#, WPF, Angular, and Flutter. Discover how to design unified data models, implement role-based access control, handle cross-platform synchronization, and maintain code reusability while delivering platform-specific user experiences.

items.title: Digital Event Management: Building Scalable QR-Based Ticketing Systems
items.excerpt: Modern event management requires robust ticketing solutions that prevent fraud and streamline operations. This technical guide walks through building a complete event management platform with ASP.NET Web Forms, covering QR code generation strategies, real-time ticket validation, database optimization for high-concurrency scenarios, and implementing secure admin dashboards. Learn how to handle peak traffic during ticket sales and ensure reliable validation at event venues.

items.title: From Data Science to Full-Stack: Building End-to-End Survey Analytics Platforms
items.excerpt: Transforming survey data into actionable insights requires more than just data collection. This article explores building a complete survey platform with real-time analytics, covering responsive form design, complex conditional logic implementation, database optimization for large-scale responses, and creating intuitive dashboards that help researchers make data-driven decisions. Includes practical examples of handling multi-question types and implementing export functionality.
